document.full_text: wal-mart stores inc announced a $15 billion share repurchase and emphasized a recent dividend rise to hearten shareholders who have seen the stock lag as its u.s. sales remain in a prolonged slump.
document.title: wal-mart sets new $15 billion buyback of lagging stock
lines_and_colors: wal-mart stores inc announced a $15 billion share repurchase and emphasized a recent dividend rise to hearten shareholders who have seen the stock lag as its u.s. sales remain in a prolonged slump.
